I'm 6'2, 225 lbs. with long arms. I was very skeptical but for the price, I decided to take a chance. It is the perfect look for the beach wedding I'm going to attend next week.  I was impressed with the packing and with the quality. It fit me well. The true test came when my lady had me model it but not like a real model. She's a mom so it was like I was trying on school clothes and it passed her high standards too.  I'm sure that I may cop a fee more of these because it is very comfortable. I'll give Amazon some dap for this suit!

The suggested size was XXL and was far too large. I would normally be 38/30 pants.  The pants are elastic, very long and have a drawstring on the OUTSIDE of the pants along with a normal button and zipper.  Very hospital pants type feel.  Jacket was OK just cheap feeling.  Took a chance on a cheap suit but this was a no go.

The trousers were fine, shorter than i expected, I'm 6'1, there were not short for the style but looking at the photos I was expecting longer. The suitcoat was too big in the midsection and very boxy overall with the pockets almost in front. Ironically I have a gut and this was still too much material. It fit in the shoulders fine . It should have been alot more fitted. It also arrived with a few stains, which is a no go. Sent it back.

I attended a black tie wedding a couple of weeks ago and didn't want to fork out a few hundred dollars for a new suite or rent a tux, knowing that I will only wear it once in a blue moon. I bought it a few weeks before the wedding, since I wasn't sure of the quality you get with a $99 suite....just in case I needed to buy something else. But, no need. The suite is lightweight, linen material, perfect for the outdoor wedding we attended. It fits well, looks sharp and I got a few compliments even from my wife who doubted my purchase. I told my good friends it only cost $99, and they thought I was kidding. Only downside, it doesn't have belt loops, only a string, which is OK since when buttoned no one can see it. I thought this might be a "one and done" suite, but I'll keep it for any other events, especially if it's hot or outside.

The materials are good but the pants are see through! They looked pretty bad even with a fair complexion so I can only imagine how bad it would look on tanner skin. The jacket was nice though but this is a suit package. I also think the sizing was off. I wear large but the large was a little snug and xl way too loose.

I did my research and measured well & got the size right on my first order! (a miracle) So make sure you follow the measurements closely. I needed a suit for a wedding, and this was stylish without making me look too boxy. I wish there was a lapel pocket so I could have added a touch of flair there. Missed opportunity. I did have to spend a great deal of time steaming out the wrinkles when I opened the suit, but it handled that well and looked great afterwards. Another complaint is that I wanted more of a 'gray' color, and this definitely looked more tan than gray. So the color wasn't 100% what I thought I was getting. But it was too late since the wedding was coming up fast and I didn't have time to get something else.

The color style and fitting were as described. I ordered a M and the suit fit perfectly, the pants were a little long but I was able to use them for the planned event without alteration. I recommend 👌

评论概述: You get what you pay for.

It took me 45 minutes to steam the wrinkles out of the suit. Jacket fit nicely however the pants were more like an extra large any large. I ended up wearing this blue suit to the wedding but at the wedding it seems started to come out of the jacket. It was quite embarrassing. I was able to wear the suit for about two hours before it began to fall apart, the price point I should've expected to happen

I bought this suit, not sure it would really be nice or fit. Much to me delight, it is very nice and fits very nice. The jacket fits well, I ordered my usual size. The pants are plenty loose, not over so, but I’m glad they have a draw string. And I don’t need to hem them. I’m 5’10.
Nice fit. Not disappointed.

Using the size guide I order what was supposed to be my size however when the suit arrive it was too big and bulky. The problem I really have is I returned the suit for a refund on May 23 and it’s now June 1st and I still don’t have my refund.

If jacket needed is large a medium pant would fit better. Pants to large. If you fit in pants you won't fit jacket will be to small. 34/36 waste is a large jacket but 34/36 pants would be a medium purchase

I measured my husband and none of the sizes completely matched his chest and his waist. We went with an XL overall. The jacket is too small by maybe an inch across the back. He will have to wear it unbuttoned. But had he gone with a XXL, the jacket would have been too large.  The pants fit, but are very long. I will have to hem them. I'm disappointed that the jacket is too small and the pants too long. I don't like to hem pants.

Ended up wearing pants I already owned and then the suit jacket.  Suit jacket is light and breathable. Worked well for a beach wedding.  You aren't getting a tailored suit, it's an Amazon suit but it didn't look cheap.  Size down if you can for a tighter fit.

This COOFANDY Khaki Linen 2-Piece Suit is an excellent choice for those who prioritize both style and comfort under the Arizona sun. The suit, when paired with denim jeans and a bamboo white tee, offers a look that is both sophisticated and effortlessly cool.  Fit: The XL size fits well for someone with a 6ft, 200lbs frame, highlighting the suit's superb tailoring as it requires no alterations.  Material: The linen material is the standout feature, providing breathability and comfort that endures even after 6 hours outdoors in the testing heat of AZ!  Style: Its versatility is impressive, suitable for various occasions where dressing up is required without compromising on comfort.  Overall:This suit comes highly recommended for its perfect fit and high-quality material, making it an essential item for anyone looking to stay stylish while keeping cool in hot climates.

I bought two of these sets size L, one in blue and one in grey. They definitely don't fit me the same. The grey jacket is breezy and flowing, the sleeves nicely hanging just below the wrist, long sleeve shirt just a bit longer; while the blue is cut closer with more of a tailored feel, not uncomfortable, but just a hint confining. I think I won't end up wearing the blue jacket much, and certainly not with a long sleeve shirt, that is my only solution. It's too late to return. The pants from both sets are more consistent in the way they feel on the body, and they fit well; after years of wearing belts with pants, I don't miss their restrictions and got quite used to the stretch and rope tie combo. The quality of fabric is good, the stitching and buttons as well.
Quality, style and value.

评论概述: Nice light suit for the summer

Looks and feels good. Bought for an 80’s party, it was perfect. Sizing could be more accurate, as the medium was small, but the large was way too big. However we made it work.
Excellent job. The product quality is fantastic for the price. Unfortunately, I am in a hurry. I cannot wait to replace it. For sure, next time, I will purchase a suit from them

They are a tad short in length and slighty wider than I would wear a normal suit but you can only get so close without tailoring. Probably would have been better to buy the suit/pants seperate so at lease I could get the pants right. Given the style, I think being a little large is ok.  Material is very thin, for our occasion, and 80s party on a cruise ship, should be perfect... Very happy and surprised at quality of this suit. My husband said it is very comfy. Fit him perfect with no alterations needed. Will buy another one in different color.

Nice lightweight, semi casual suit, that's affordable and comfortable. Fit was pretty for an off the shelf suit. Coat is long enough for people with longer torsos, and the pants where big enough for someone with above average weight. Materials feel pretty nice too! Overall a cool suit for semi-formal events.

I love the price but you get what you pay for. Pants fit well jacket a little small but kind of like a "modern" fit and certainly wearable. I normally take a 46L jacket and I would say this feels like a 45 regular.

评论概述: Very comfortable suit with soft material
评论详情: This 2 piece linen suit set combines style and comfort. Its regular fit offers a comfortable yet sophisticated look suitable for various occasions. I used this suit for Halloween dressed as Slugworth from Willy Wonka. The lightweight linen material ensures breathability, ideal for warmer climates or casual events. The set's blazer jacket and pants complement each other perfectly, enhancing the overall appeal. Overall, this suit set impresses with its blend of comfort, style, and versatility, making it a great choice for those seeking a casually elegant ensemble suitable for both formal and relaxed. The pants are my favorite and feel like sweatpants.

评论概述: The material isn't typical suit style
评论详情: With this suit, the one difference I really noticed was the material itself. It doesn't have a silky smoothness to it that I typically expect from a suit. This suit material felt more like a tablecloth or liner type of material which which looks very good still, but it doesn't feel as comfortable. I will say the benefit of this is the suit does feel more breathable than some thicker, smoother suits that just feel extremely dense

Im really excited to wear this suit for summer since linen is perfect and flowy. Even though I haven't worn it out for a full day yet the fit is spot on, regular but not baggy. Linen's perfect for warmer weather, keeps things breezy and comfortable. I love how  It’s casual enough for a relaxed look, yet sharp enough to stand out. The quality is solid. The suit holds its shape aswell.
My son loves this suit. It is light weight so perfect for SC weather.

This suit is perfect for our trip to the Bahamas.  The suit is lightweight and cool and wears very nicely.  It actually goes really well with a plain crisp white V-neck T.  Gives off a dressy casual vibe.  The pants have a button closure along with the drawstring, to give off the casual look with a suit pants feel.  The material feels very nice.  It's very breathable and feels just the teensiest grainier than my white linen pants, but those are kind of see through too.  It wrinkles easy, but they steam right out. It's totally Caribbean beach style! I'm super happy with it and definitely recommend it!

评论概述: Price and quality just right for excellent value
评论详情: This is a really nice and inexpensive, basic, type of suit. Being that it's on the cheaper side in terms of price, my expectations weren't very high and figured I'd use this suit in a pinch if needed. However, I'm actually very pleasantly surprised at how much I like this suit. I ended up wearing it right away after getting it at my cousin's wedding and it fit very well, the quality was much better than expected, and is confidence inspiring. For the quality and price the value is very high! Recommend this suit.

The suit is lightweight and well made. The top fits absolutely perfect while the pants are just a bit off so my husband pairs the blazer with jeans and it looks great. Great value for the money for the Blazer itself.

This is a very pleasant shade of blue as I typically could only find navy dark blue or a very light pastel blue. This wears well. My only disappointment is that the pants are drawstring with no button or clasp. Otherwise, it looks great. Since there are no belt loops you can cover the drawstring. Only other thing is to use clip-on suspenders.
Great fit. Great value.

I needed a suit for a film screening in Los Angeles. I'm not much of a "clothes" person and the only suits I had were heavy and quite dowdy business affairs. Then I saw this and, although I've never worn a linen suit before, I thought I'd give it a try.  If you're not familiar, linen is a lightweight material, ideal for semi-casual wear and is especially at home in warmer climes. It can crumple quite easily but apparently, according to my better dressed friends, that is part of the look.  I liked the chalky blue color though the suit comes in a variety of shades if that's not your thing.  Overall this worked for me. The fit was good. It's on the slim side, particularly if you associate linen with a "baggy" look but I found it very comfortable for my size and shape. If you are a little heavier set, you might want to size up but, beyond that, I couldn't find anything not to like about this garment and I'll definitely be wearing it again.

Overall this is an excellent suit. The material is not the highest quality, but it's good for the price. It came with a suit jacket and pants.  The jacket has long sleeves. It could get adjusted very easily but the medium size I purchased was very long. This is an issue to take into account. Besides this, the suit feels great and looks amazing!  The pants were also very long. I'm 5'10 and purchased the medium. There was an extra 2-4 inches of length below my ankle. The waist also has strings to tie so it isn't as formal as using a belt. But they are breathable and comfortable since they are loose.  Overall a decent suit if you need something quickly! It's more business casual which makes it versatile!

评论概述: Great summer suit for the beach
评论详情: The suit did what it needed to do at a great price
I'd like it a lot put a dress shirt on the tie got a formal suit put a casual shirt on and you have a leasure suit
This suit might work in a pinch. I got it mostly for a different coat to wear. The pants are entirely too long, but the coat might go with a pair of jeans. It isn't anything to wear to a gala event.
This linen is thick and it fits nicely without tailoring. My son loves it

评论概述: The jacket is good. The pants are a little weird.
评论详情: It's a little tough purchasing a suit with the same size for the top and bottom. The jacket fits good overall, but the arm pit area seems to be sewn a little weird like it's meant for someone with large shoulders as opposed to just bigger muscular arms. A smaller size wouldn't fit the arm circumference, I don't think. The pants fit pretty oddly, but I think a smaller size was needed in this case for the pants. They are a drawstring closure so you can tighten them, but in order for the crotch to be in the right spot, I had to pull the pants up past the belly-button. Definitely made for someone taller. However, I will probably just pair the jacket with some other slacks that fit better. Quality of the fabric is great.

Pros: Rich coloring Comfortable fit Relaxed look Breathable material  Cons: Very wide at the waist Weird shoulder padding  This suit set is a great casual option. Linen suits tend to make people think of the beach and this one is no exception. It’s perfect for hot weather, humidity, and functionality. While it’s not something I would suggest wearing to a beach wedding, it’s the perfect choice for a casual outing.  The material is thin, but doesn’t feel cheap. It offers exceptional breathability and comfort. There is no stretch to the fabric itself, but the added elastic at the back of the pants means that there is plenty of flexibility at the waistline.  The fit is a little odd. I ordered this in the size medium and while the jacket fits very well, the pants are somewhat huge at the waist. Considering the vintage styling typically associated with linen suits, I expected a wider waistline, however, this is a bit extreme. Great choice for those with a little extra around the middle though.  Overall, I think that this is a nice choice for those looking for something comfortable and casually put-together.

I recently ordered a men's suit and I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase. In terms of value for money, this suit delivers outstanding quality without breaking the bank. The material is durable and feels comfortable, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone in need of a reliable suit for various occasions.  Value for Money: Considering the affordable price, the quality of this suit is impressive. The fabric feels luxurious, and the stitching is well-done, reflecting attention to detail. For the price I paid, I received a suit that looks and feels much more expensive. It's a practical choice for individuals seeking a budget-friendly option without compromising on style and durability.  Lightweight and Easy to Wash: The suit is surprisingly lightweight, making it suitable for year-round wear. Its breathable fabric ensures comfort, even during warmer seasons. Additionally, one of the notable features is its ease of maintenance. The suit is easy to wash and care for, saving time and effort when it comes to keeping it clean and presentable. This convenience adds to its overall value, especially for individuals with busy lifestyles.  Sturdy and Fits Well: The suit's sturdiness is evident in its well-constructed design. The seams are strong, and the buttons are securely attached, indicating durability. Moreover, the suit fits well, providing a tailored look without the need for expensive alterations. The accurate sizing options available ensure that customers can find a suit that fits them comfortably, enhancing both appearance and confidence.  Neutral Points: While the suit offers great value, there are a few neutral aspects to consider. Firstly, the color options, while classic, could be expanded to cater to a broader range of preferences. Providing a more extensive color palette would allow customers to choose suits that align with their personal style.  Additionally, while the suit is easy to wash, it's advisable to follow the care instructions diligently to maintain its quality over time. Like any well-made garment, proper care is essential for longevity, and customers should be aware of the recommended washing methods and guidelines provided by the manufacturer.  In Summary: This men's suit is a fantastic choice for individuals seeking a budget-friendly option without compromising on quality and style. Its exceptional value for money, lightweight design, ease of washing, and sturdy construction make it a practical and reliable wardrobe addition. Whether for professional events, formal occasions, or everyday wear, this suit offers a sophisticated look without the hefty price tag.  Key Points:  Value for Money: Affordable yet high-quality suit, delivering excellent value for the price. Lightweight and Easy to Wash: Comfortable and breathable fabric, easy to maintain for long-lasting wear. Sturdy and Fits Well: Well-constructed suit, secure seams, and accurate sizing options ensure durability and a tailored fit. Color Options: Consider expanding the color range to cater to diverse customer preferences. Care Instructions: Customers should follow recommended care instructions for optimal garment longevity.

It's a great summer suit!  I am impressed with how excellent this suit is for spring and summer.  It's well-designed, easy to slip on, and matches any shoes or shirt.  The color blue is striking without being obnoxious.One item of note is the sizing is just a bit small compared to other XXL items.  I wish it had a bit more room in the chest and around the waist.
